sensory_systems.name: Advanced Dough Viscosity Sensor
sensory_systems.description: A multi-parametric sensor system using a combination of laser Doppler vibrometry, ultrasonic wave detection, and shear stress measurement to continuously monitor dough viscosity, elasticity, and gluten development in real-time. Analyzes the consistency of the dough at various points during the mixing and kneading phases.

specifications.measurement_range: Viscosity: 1-100 Pa·s, Elasticity: 1-100 kPa, Gluten Development: 0-100% (relative strength)

sensory_systems.name: Grain Analysis Spectrometer
sensory_systems.description: Hyperspectral imaging system that analyzes the composition of grains (flour, seeds) - protein, starch, fiber, and moisture content – before and during the process. Utilizes Raman spectroscopy for non-destructive analysis.

sensory_systems.name: Bake Quality Analyzer (Optical)
sensory_systems.description: A high-resolution camera system coupled with machine learning algorithms. It assesses crust color, crumb structure, and overall bake quality in real-time based on color, texture, and size measurements. Incorporates diffusion tensor imaging (DTI) for crumb analysis.

specifications.accuracy: Crust Color: ±5 CIE Lab values, Crumb Structure: Relative Texture Comparison (qualitative assessment)

sensory_systems.name: Aroma Detection System (Electronic Nose)
sensory_systems.description: An array of micro-sensors mimicking the human olfactory system. Detects and quantifies volatile organic compounds (VOCs) released during baking, providing data on bread aroma development. Uses gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) for detailed analysis.

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) with Sensory Feedback
control_systems.description: A sophisticated control system utilizing MPC algorithms to optimize mixing, kneading, proofing, and baking parameters based on real-time sensory data. Incorporates reinforcement learning for adaptive control.

control_systems.name: Adaptive Dough Rheology Control
control_systems.description: Dynamically adjusts mixing speed, temperature, and ingredient addition rates based on continuous viscosity measurements, ensuring optimal dough development.

mechanical_systems.name: Autonomous Robotic Arm (Bread Forming)
mechanical_systems.description: A multi-axis robotic arm equipped with tactile sensors and pneumatic actuators for precise shaping and forming of dough into various bread shapes (boules, baguettes, etc.).

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Proofing Chamber
mechanical_systems.description: A temperature and humidity-controlled chamber with precise air circulation for optimized dough proofing. Incorporates ultrasonic sensors to monitor dough expansion.

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Conveyor System
mechanical_systems.description: A guided conveyor system for automated transport of bread loaves through the baking process, equipped with integrated sensors for monitoring loaf position and orientation.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Bread Baking System
software_integration.description: A virtual representation of the entire bread baking process, used for simulation, optimization, and fault detection.  Includes a physics-based bread dough model.

software_integration.name: AI-Powered Recipe Generation & Adaptation
software_integration.description: An algorithm that generates bread recipes based on desired flavor profiles, ingredients on hand, and baking equipment capabilities. Adapts recipes in real-time based on sensory feedback.

key_research_areas: Adaptive Control Algorithms for Food Processing
